articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Google’s ‘dark web report’ feature will no longer be available starting in February - TechCrunch
articles.description: Launched initially about a year and a half ago, this tool aimed to help users monitor their personal information on the dark web.
articles.content: Google has revealed that its dark web report feature will be discontinued starting February 16, 2026. Launched initially about a year and a half ago, this tool aimed to help users monitor their perso… [+2047 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Facebook Messenger’s desktop app is no more - TechCrunch
articles.description: The app remains usable via the web, Facebook app, and through the mobile app for iOS and Android.
articles.content: RIP to Facebook Messenger’s desktop app. The native app for Mac and Windows is no longer available to users as of today, December 15, 2025, and existing users are being directed to the Facebook websi… [+1845 chars]
